summary: Called to active duty during WW2, reserve Navy Lieutenant Alec Austin struggles to do his military duties while observing his Quaker beliefs, at the dismay of his comrades.
cast: Alan Ladd|Dianne Foster|William Bendix|Keenan Wynn|James Whitmore|Efrem Zimbalist Jr.|Joey Bishop|Barbara Eiler|Ross Bagdasarian|Jeanette Nolan|Walter Reed|Peter Hansen|Richard Crane|Steven Marlo|Perry Lopez|Warren Douglas|Nestor Paiva|Francesca Bellini|Edd Byrnes|Robert Clarke|Ann Doran|Don Hayden|Carol Lee Ladd|Jerry Mathers|Steve Mitchell|Paul Picerni|Louis Quinn|Franz Roehn|Fred Sherman|Barbara Stuart|Robert Whiteside
title: La profundidad del mar
